text: KidsTv.

I don’t want to brush my teeth 
Brush my teeth brush my teeth

I don’t want to brush my teeth
They’re already clean and bright

If you do not brush your teeth 
Brush your teeth brush your teeth

If you do not brush your teeth
You’ll lose your beautiful bite

I don’t want to take a bath 
take a bath take a bath

I don’t want to take a bath
So early I’m not keen

If you do not take a bath
take a bath take a bath

If you do not take a bath
You’ll not smell pretty and clean

I don’t want to eat veggies 
eat veggies eat veggies

I don’t want to eat veggies 
They never taste any good

If you do not eat veggies
eat veggies eat veggies

If you do not eat veggies
You’ll miss your healthy food

I don’t want to go to school 
go to school go to school

I don’t want to go to school
I’ll stay at home all day

If you do not go to school
go to school go to school

If you do not go to school
You’ll have no friends to play

I don’t want to go to bed
go to bed go to bed

I don’t want to go to bed
I want to play all night

If you do not go to bed
go to bed go to bed

If you do not go to bed
You’ll miss the morning bright
